queries.query: malevolent construct with powerful melee attacks and magic resistance
queries.variant: construct that is malevolent, has strong melee attacks and resists magic

queries.query: medium creature that can communicate with telepathy and does force damage
queries.variant: medium-sized monster able to speak via telepathy and inflicts force damage

queries.query: creature with high strength score that can immobilize foes and has a low dexterity
queries.variant: monster featuring a high strength and the ability to immobilize enemies, but with a low dexterity

queries.query: void-themed knight that doesn’t require food or sleep and can pull enemies closer
queries.variant: knight themed around the void that needs neither food nor sleep and can tug enemies nearer

queries.query: construct with high armor class that deals slashing and force damage in combat
queries.variant: construct featuring a high AC that delivers slashing and force damage during fights
